samples.question: Do you like weekends man?
samples.transcript: Yes, of course. I love weekends because it is the only time which when I can relax and spend time with my loved ones after a long week. >> Mhm.

samples.question: Do you study or work?
samples.transcript: >> Basically, I spend weekends by watching movie or spending time with my loved ones or sometimes I prefer going out to any restaurant or cafe. And I basically do not study a lot on weekends but I study only when it is required or necessary. >> Mhm.

samples.question: When do you spend time with your family?

samples.question: Is it easy to meet people from different cultural background in your country?
